name: imoova-bot
description: TG Bot to parce adverts from Imoova

scripts.dev: npm run dev-mongo && npm run dev-bot
scripts.dev-bot: ts-node scripts/configs.ts && ts-node scripts/debug.ts --enable && ts-node scripts/rmdist.ts && nodemon --exec ts-node --compiler typescript app/core/bot.ts
scripts.release: ts-node scripts/configs.ts && ts-node scripts/debug.ts --enable && npm run build && tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.npm-publish-beta: git checkout beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.npm-publish-nightly: git checkout nightly && npm publish --tag nightly
scripts.pkg-clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && husky install
scripts.pkg-upgrade: npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install && husky install
